title: Yu☆Gi☆Oh!: Duel Monsters GX (Yu-Gi-Oh! GX)
synopsis: In the world of Duel Monsters, a new generation of duelists await their turn to bid for the highest title: The King of Games. As an aspiring duelist, the happy-go-lucky Juudai Yuuki enrolls at the Duel Academy, a reputable institution tasked with nurturing these potential challengers.
